489877ccabad59a752aea38efa8b439a06097b8d.content:
**Daily Development Report – 26 Jan 2026** | Category | Highlights | |---|---| | **CI/CD** | • Added a GitHub Actions workflow to run lint, tests, and build steps automatically. | | **Editor & AI** | • Integrated BlockNote editor for memo functionality.
• Enhanced AI‑suggestion language support and added an “AI prompt copy” button. | | **Electron & Theme API** | • Fixed linting errors in Electron integration and theme API. | | **UI / Navigation** | • Migrated sidebar navigation icons to a dynamic icon‑set system.
• Decoupled icon set from theme selection and introduced global icon sets in Theme Lab. | | **Settings / Persistence** | • Resolved settings persistence by reading from `.env` and fixed settings‑save logic.
• Improved theme‑hover UI/animations. | | **Localization** | • Completed Japanese localization. | | **Vault & Workspace** | • Implemented mandatory vault selection, workspace management, and vault‑storage mode.
• Added sidebar switcher and UI theme synchronization. | | **Theme Lab** | • Added popular theme presets (Catppuccin, Monokai, Solarized Light).
• Finalized readability and contrast polish across all theme presets.
• Added real‑time CSS preview and ensured reliable theme selection. | | **Miscellaneous** | • Unified Note Timeline blocks and enhanced overall UI aesthetics. | | **AI Features** | • Introduced AI‑powered project absorption for daily notes and task suggestions. | **Key Takeaways** - The project now has a fully automated CI pipeline. - Core editor functionality and AI integration have been significantly expanded. - Theme and icon handling has been modularized, improving maintainability. - Localization and workspace features are now complete, positioning the app for broader user adoption.

501bdb138d1b823438da481bc441e193b731235c.content:
エレクトロンアプリのユニットテストと統合テストを追加し、CIでの自動テストを確実にする。  
WCAG AA基準に準拠するアクセシビリティ向上を実装し、スクリーンリーダー対応を確認する。  
日本語以外の主要言語（英語・中国語・韓国語）のローカライズを追加し、言語切替機能を改良する。  
ビルドサイズを分析し、コード分割や圧縮を行い起動時間を短縮する。  
ユーザーマニュアルとチュートリアルを作成し、設定画面のヘルプを充実させる。
